name: my-live-support-2025
description: Live Support System - Fullstack Chat & Ticket Management

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"

scripts.format: npm --workspace apps/api run format && npm --workspace apps/web run format
